page.title: 09A NEW HOUSING DEVELOPMENT
page.content: A NEW HOUSING DEVELOPMENT Near to our school there is a new housing estate.It is called Hope Fold Farm Estate because before the new houses were built there was a farm there. The estate overlooks a large reservoir which has had to be partly drained to build on.The site was chosen because it was the only large area of land available at the time.Much of the other land nearby cannot be built on because it is marsh land.Before they started building in 1981,7 terraced houses were demolished and the owners rehoused to make room for the new buildings.There are now 97 semi_detached houses each with a garden,front and back.There are 7 still unoccupied but they hope to finish by July 1986.
